description: A humorous encounter where Charlie plays a knock-knock joke on Alex, showcasing their contrasting personalities.
title: The Control Freak Joke
n_1: Charlie arrives at Alex's house, ready to share a joke.
n_3: Charlie interrupts Alex, guiding the joke to its punchline.
n_4: They both burst into laughter, enjoying the silly moment.
c1_3: Okay, now you say, 'Control Freak who?'
